name: Voice from Hell
description:
I am a scary skull and I love entertaining people and helping them get distracted with a little skull-fun.

● Say something and I will repeat, moreover, I can sing in a scary way to make you feel an adrenalin rush!

● Touch and discover scary surprises!

● Enjoy true horror and anticipate your voice from hell!

● Touch flies to smash them right on my face!

● Record me in action and share with friends

NOTE: All of the above is strictly for entertainment purposes and should be taken with humour. The application in no way represents any religious beliefs.
